recipes.name: Rice
recipes.author: Bisso
recipes.description: Rice is Main food in Bangladesh. Usually, people eat rice with some other curry.
recipes.preparation: Add water and rice and start boiling in high heat. When it boiled properly, stop heating, leave the rice to absorb all the moisture.
